t: 2:9*r The Greek word for brother*i or*i sister*i (adelphos) refers here to a believer, whether man or woman, as part of God’s family; also in verse 11; and in 3:15, 17; 4:20; 5:16.
2:10*r The Greek word for brother*i and*i sister*i (adelphos) refers here to a believer, whether man or woman, as part of God’s family; also in 3:10; 4:20, 21.
2:20*r Some manuscripts and*i you*i know*i all*i things*i
3:2*r Or when*i it*i is*i made*i known*i
3:13*r The Greek word for brothers*i and*i sisters*i (adelphoi) refers here to believers, both men and women, as part of God’s family; also in verse 16.

5:7,8*r Late manuscripts of the Vulgate testify*i in*i heaven:*i the*i Father,*i the*i Word*i and*i the*i Holy*i Spirit,*i and*i these*i three*i are*i one.*i And*i there*i are*i three*i that*i testify*i on*i earth:*i the*i (not found in any Greek manuscript before the fourteenth century)
